HOME.TITLE: ZITADEL
HOME.SECURITYANDPRIVACY_DESC: Manage your Information and Security settings
HOME.PROTECTION_DESC: Manage your organisational guidelines. Explore some pre-packaged solutions that save you time and ensure security.
HOME.PROJECTS: Create and Manage your Applications with Projects
HOME.PROJECTS_DESC: Authorize others to use your projects or define custom roles on eligible projects.
HOME.USERS_DESC: Monitor your role concept in real time. Take immediate action.
HOME.WELCOMESENTENCE: Here you can find recommended Actions based on your last acquired permissions. Note that you may have to select your organisation in the header above.
HOME.DISCLAIMER: You can only see settings of your current organisation specified in the header. ZITADEL treats your data confidentially and securely.

MENU.IAMADMIN: You are an IAM Administrator. Note that you have extended permissions!

TOKENINVALID.TITLE: Your auth token has expired
TOKENINVALID.DESCRIPTION: Click the button below to login again!

USER.TITLE: Personal Information
USER.DESCRIPTION: Manage your Information and Security settings.

PAGES.TITLE: User
PAGES.DESCRIPTION: Create new user in your organisation and manage existing ones.
PAGES.DESCRIPTIONMACHINE: Create and manage Service Users of your organisation

MFA.TITLE: Multifactor Authentication
MFA.DESCRIPTION: Add a second factor to ensure optimal security for your account.
MFA.MANAGE_DESCRIPTION: Manage the second factor methods of your users.
MFA.OTP_DIALOG_DESCRIPTION: Scan the QR code with an authenticator app and enter the code below to verify and activate OTP.

CODEDIALOG.TITLE: Verify Phone Number
CODEDIALOG.DESCRIPTION: Enter the code you recieved by message to verify your phone.

MACHINE.TITLE: Service User Details
MACHINE.NAME: Name
MACHINE.KEYSDESC: Define your keys and add an optional expiration date.

ADD.TITLE: Add Key
ADD.DESCRIPTION: Select your key type and choose an optional expiry date.

PASSWORD.TITLE: Password
PASSWORD.DESCRIPTION: Enter the new password according to the policy below.
PASSWORD.MINLENGTHERROR: The Password has to be at least {{value}} characters long
PASSWORD.NOTEQUAL: The password provided is not equal!

LOGINMETHODS.TITLE: Contact Information
LOGINMETHODS.DESCRIPTION: The provided information is used to send important information, like password reset Emails to you.

GRANTS.TITLE: User Grants
GRANTS.DESCRIPTION: Give this user control of certain projects

CREATE.TITLE: Create User Grant
CREATE.DESCRIPTION: Search for the organisation, the project and the corresponding project roles!

VALIDATION.INVALIDPATTERN: ## TODO - Replace with Password Policy text - TODO ##
VALIDATION.MINLENGTH: The password has to be at least {{requiredLength}} characters long!
VALIDATION.NOEMAIL: Username can not be an email address!
VALIDATION.UPPERCASEMISSING: The password must include a uppercase character!
VALIDATION.LOWERCASEMISSING: The password must include a lowercase character!
VALIDATION.SYMBOLERROR: The password must include a symbol!
VALIDATION.NUMBERERROR: The password must include a number!

TARGET.SELF: If you want to grant a user of an other organisation
TARGET.EXTERNAL: To grant a user of your organisation

USER.SIGNEDOUT: You are signed out. Click the button below to sign in again!

MEMBERSHIPS.TITLE: Zitadel Manager Roles
MEMBERSHIPS.DESCRIPTION: These are all member grants of the user. You can modify them also on organisation-, project-, or iam detailpages.

MEMBER.TITLE: Managers
MEMBER.DESCRIPTION: Managers can add and edit organisations and make changes to their corresponding projects and apps

VIEWS.TITLE: Views
VIEWS.DESCRIPTION: This Card shows your Zitadel Views.

FAILEDEVENTS.TITLE: Failed Events
FAILEDEVENTS.DESCRIPTION: This Card shows your failed Events.

PAGES.ORGDETAIL_TITLE: Enter the name and domain of your new organisation.
PAGES.ORGDOMAIN_VERIFICATION: Verify ownership of your domain. You need to download a verification file and upload it at the provided URL listed below or place a TXT Record at the provided Url. To complete, click the button to verify.
PAGES.ORGDOMAIN_VERIFICATION_SKIP: You can skip verification for now and continue to create your organisation, but in order to use your organisation this step has to be completed!
PAGES.ORGDOMAIN_VERIFICATION_VALIDATION_DESC: The tokens are checked regularly to ensure you are still owner of the domain.
PAGES.ORGDOMAIN_VERIFICATION_NEWTOKEN_DESC: If you want to request a new token, select you preferred method, if you want to validate a persisting token, click on the button above.
PAGES.ORGDOMAIN_VERIFICATION_VALIDATION_ONGOIN: A verification token has already been requested. Click on the button to trigger a verification check!

DOMAINS.TITLE: Domains
DOMAINS.DESCRIPTION: Configure your domains. This domain can be used to login with your users.

DELETE.TITLE: Delete domain?
DELETE.DESCRIPTION: You are about to delete one of your domains. Note that your users can no longer use this domain for their logins.

ADD.TITLE: Add domain
ADD.DESCRIPTION: You are about to add a domain for your organization. After successful process, you users will be able to use the domain for their login.

MEMBER.TITLE: Organisation Managers
MEMBER.DESCRIPTION: Define Users which can change your organisations preferences.

POLICY.TITLE: Explore Policies
POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Pre-packaged policies that enhance your security.

PWD_COMPLEXITY.TITLE: Password Complexity
PWD_COMPLEXITY.DESCRIPTION: Ensures that all set passwords correspond to a specific pattern
PWD_COMPLEXITY.DESCRIPTIONCREATE: Ensures that all set passwords correspond to a specific pattern
PWD_COMPLEXITY.SYMBOLANDNUMBERERROR: The password must consist of a number and a symbol
PWD_COMPLEXITY.SYMBOLERROR: The password must include a symbol!
PWD_COMPLEXITY.NUMBERERROR: The password must include a number!
PWD_COMPLEXITY.PATTERNERROR: The required pattern is not fulfilled!

PWD_AGE.TITLE: Maximal Password Age
PWD_AGE.DESCRIPTION: You can set a max age property for passwords. This policy includes a warning after a specific time has elapsed
PWD_AGE.DESCRIPTIONCREATE: You can set a max age property for passwords. This policy includes a warning after a specific time has elapsed

PWD_LOCKOUT.TITLE: Password Lockout
PWD_LOCKOUT.DESCRIPTION: Password retries are infinite in default mode. You have to install this policy if you want to show retries or set a max amount of trials.
PWD_LOCKOUT.DESCRIPTIONCREATE: Password retries are infinite in default mode. You have to install this policy if you want to show retries or set a max amount of trials.

IAM_POLICY.TITLE: IAM Access Preferences
IAM_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Define access properties of your users
IAM_POLICY.DESCRIPTIONCREATE: Emails as username is not allowed for enabled UserLoginMustBeDomain

ORG_DETAIL.TITLE: Organisation
ORG_DETAIL.DESCRIPTION: Here you can edit your organisation configuration and manage members

MEMBER.TITLE: Members
MEMBER.ADDDESCRIPTION: Enter the mail addresses of the users to be added!

PAGES.TITLE: Project
PAGES.DESCRIPTION: Here you can define applications, manage roles and grant other organisations to use your project
PAGES.LISTDESCRIPTION: Here you can find all projects you are allowed to view or perform actions on. If you can't find a project, contact a project owner or someone with the corresponding rights to gain project access.
PAGES.ZITADELPROJECT: This belongs to ZITADEL project. If you change something, ZITADEL may not behave as intended!

REACTIVATE.TITLE: Reactivate project
REACTIVATE.DESCRIPTION: Do you really want to ractivate your project?

DEACTIVATE.TITLE: Deactivate project
DEACTIVATE.DESCRIPTION: Do you really want to deactivate your project?

DELETE.TITLE: Projekt löschen
DELETE.DESCRIPTION: Wollen Sie das Project wirklich löschen?

MEMBER.TITLE: Managers
MEMBER.TITLEDESC: Managers can make changes on this project, based on their role.
MEMBER.DESCRIPTION: Here you can find all managers of this project. You can add a new member and manage existing ones.

GRANT.TITLE: Granted organisations
GRANT.DESCRIPTION: Allow an other organisation to use your project

CREATE.TITLE: Create organisation grant
CREATE.SEL_USERS: Select the users you wish to grant
CREATE.SEL_ROLES: Select the roles you want to be added to the grant
CREATE.SEL_ORG_DESC: Enter the complete domain to specify the organisation to grant!
CREATE.ORG_DESCRIPTION: You are about to grant a user for the organisation {{name}}
CREATE.ORG_DESCRIPTION_DESC: Switch the context in the header above to grant a user for another organisation

DETAIL.TITLE: Managers of the granted organisation
DETAIL.DESC: These are the Managers of the granted organisation. You can select which users are allowed to maintain control of the project.
DETAIL.MEMBERDESC: These are the managers of the granted organisation. Add users here, who should gain access to edit data of the project.

ROLE.TITLE: Roles
ROLE.DESCRIPTION: Define some roles which can be used to create project-grants
ROLE.NAME: Name
ROLE.ADDDESCRIPTION: Enter the data for the new role!
ROLE.EDITDESCRIPTION: Enter the new data for the role!
ROLE.SELECTGROUPTOOLTIP: Select all Roles of the group {{group}}

PAGES.TITLE: Application
PAGES.DESCRIPTION: Here you can edit your application data and its configuration
PAGES.CREATE_OIDC_DESC_TITLE: Enter your application details step by step
PAGES.CREATE_OIDC_DESC_SUB: A recommended configuration will be automatically generated.

OIDC.PROSWITCH: I'm a pro. Skip this wizard.
OIDC.TYPETITLE: What type of application do you want to create?
OIDC.REDIRECTTITLE: Specify the urls where the login will redirect to.
OIDC.POSTREDIRECTTITLE: This is the redirect after logout.
OIDC.REDIRECTDESCRIPTIONWEB: Redirects must begin with https://. http:// is only valid with enabled dev mode.
OIDC.REDIRECTDESCRIPTIONNATIVE: Redirects must begin with your own protocol or http://localhost!
OIDC.TITLE: OIDC Configuration
OIDC.CLIENTSECRET_DESCRIPTION: Save your Client Secret as it will disappear once the dialog is closed!
OIDC.DEVMODEDESC: With enabled dev mode, redirect uris will not be validated!
OIDC.GRANTTITLE: Select your grant types. Note: Implicit is only available for browser based applications.
OIDC.UNSECUREREDIRECT: I sure hope you know what you are doing.
OIDC.OVERVIEWTITLE: You are now done. Review your configuration

PROJECT.TITLE: Authorizations
PROJECT.DESCRIPTION: Define Authorizations for the specified project. Note that you can only see entries from projects and users where you are permitted to.

USER.TITLE: Authorizations
USER.DESCRIPTION: Define Authorizations for the specified user. Note that you can only see entries from projects and users where you are permitted to.

CREATE.TITLE: Create authorization
CREATE.DESCRIPTION: Search for the orgnanization, the project and the corresponding roles.

ORG.TITLE: Activity
ORG.DESCRIPTION: Here you can see the latest events that have affected an organisation change

PROJECT.TITLE: Activity
PROJECT.DESCRIPTION: Here you can see the latest events that have affected a projectchange

USER.TITLE: Activity
USER.DESCRIPTION: Here you can see the latest events that have affected a userchange
